snippet: Mitt Romney has embraced Tim Pawlenty, seeking his advice about running against President Obama and dispatching him to Republican events on his behalf.
abstract: Tim Pawlenty is being considered for the Republican ticket, after a short-lived presidential bid of his own; one-time rival Mitt Romney, who is on the cusp of announcing his vice-presidential selection, has embraced Pawlenty, seeking his advice about running against President Obama and sending him to Republican events on his behalf. (Series: The Ticket)
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney has embraced Tim Pawlenty, seeking his advice about running against President Obama and dispatching him to Republican events on his behalf.

headline.seo: Pawlenty Looked at as Romney Running Mate
headline.main: In Pawlenty, Romney Campaign May Find Down-to-Earth Appeal
headline.print_headline: In Pawlenty, Romney Campaign May Find Down-to-Earth Appeal
